entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Stony Plain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Plain 09:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
